allow: Bash(powershell -Command "Set-Location ''D:\prog\Pre-DateGrip''; if (Test-Path build) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build }; Get-ChildItem -Filter ''*.sln'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Force; Get-ChildItem -Filter ''*.vcxproj*'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Force; Write-Host ''Cleaned up old files''")
Bash(cmd /c """C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars64.bat"" && cd /d D:\prog\Pre-DateGrip && cmake --build build --config Release")
Bash(cmd /c """D:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build\vcvars64.bat"" && cd /d D:\prog\Pre-DateGrip && cmake --build build --config Release 2>&1")
Bash(cmd /c "set PATH=C:\nvm4w\nodejs;%PATH% && cd /d D:\prog\Pre-DateGrip\frontend && npm run build")
Bash(cmd /c "set PATH=C:\nvm4w\nodejs;%PATH% && cd /d D:\prog\Pre-DateGrip\frontend && npm run typecheck 2>&1")
Bash(cmd /c "set PATH=C:\nvm4w\nodejs;%PATH% && cd /d D:\prog\Pre-DateGrip\frontend && call npm run lint")
